HydroBay: Designed a dashboard where the user can monitor and maintain their hydroponics/cultivation module remotely.
The dashboard visualizes data from a hydroponics Internet of Things artifact and utilizes AWS as a data host.
I worked in close cooperation with back-end and front-end developers.
FKassan: Developed a new feature for the Swedish Social Insurance Agency's mobile application which helps the user to report VAB (temporary parental benefit) and to keep track of their parental allowance.
I interviewed existing and potential end-users to validate the design and its serviceability.
AreaChica: Redesigned their website and created a more seamless onboarding process.
Utilization of gamification to promote and encourage site activity.
I conducted several user interviews and did multiple usability tests on the low-fidelity & high-fidely prototypes.
DreamsNordic: Created 'The Coach'; a function that will assist the user in the onboarding process and customizes their experience based on their needs, habits and preferences.
I worked closely with the client from development to final prototype to ensure quality and efficiency.
